description:
Fly like an eagle, perform spectacular dramatic half-pipe stunts and race down the ice track or across the slopes. Take on sporting challenges in eight action-packed winter sports disciplines. 
Play alone against the AI or together with up to three friends and experience thrilling competitions packed full of fun: Set the record and win the trophy!

•  5 tournaments with varying levels of difficulty
•  Arrange your own sports event
•  Local multiplayer mode for up to 4 athletes 

8 cool winter sports:
• Freestyle skiing
• Snowboard
• Curling
• Giant slalom
• Alpine skiing
• Ski jumping
• Luge
• Bobsleigh
name: Winter Games Challenge
